title: The Nature Mill | All natural beauty & food products
author: — Ruma; Business Head; Age Defyer
description: The Nature Mill creates all natural beauty & food products with the purest ingredients. We travel ourselves to small hamlets & farms to find the purest ingredients in remote locations across Kashmir, Himachal, Uttarakhand, Rajasthan, and Tamil Nadu. From Himalayan oils to aloe vera creams to wholesome mueslis...
cleaned_text: Our range of all natural beauty & food products Nature's greatest hits, for you & the planet made in small bits, all that artificial stuff discarded pulling recipes & wisdom of yore, only sustainably have we conjured helping small producers who will surely regale our secret ingredient is love something that the big guys can't scale
